page.title: Contact
page.head: Contact
page.p: omniORB is currently maintained by Duncan Grisby through Apasphere Ltd. Feel free to email with questions and suggestions about omniORB development and support.
If you have a problem using omniORB, your best bet is probably to post to the omniORB mailing list.
If you are interested in commercial support, see www.omniorb-support.com.
